member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.HorizontalItemAnchor
member.summary: Defines possible horizontal placements of the child controls relative to the carousel's path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.HorizontalItemAnchor.Left
member.summary: Child element is aligned to the left of the path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.HorizontalItemAnchor.Center
member.summary: Child element is centered horizontally relative to the path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.HorizontalItemAnchor.Right
member.summary: Child element is aligned to the right of the path.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.VerticalItemAnchor
member.summary: Defines possible vertical placements of the child controls relative to the carousel's path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.VerticalItemAnchor.Top
member.summary: Child element is aligned to the top of the path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.VerticalItemAnchor.Center
member.summary: Child element is centered vertically relative to the path.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.VerticalItemAnchor.Bottom
member.summary: Child element is aligned to the bottom of the path.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel
member.summary: Represents a virtualizing panel that lays out its child elements along an arbitrary path.
member.remarks:
The can be used only as a panel of ItemsControl or derived control, it can't be used as a standalone panel.
Most of the properties are attached properties, so their values can be specified on ItemsControl that hosts the panel.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.PageSize
member.summary: Defines the number of visible items in . This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of space between and its child elements. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.PathGeometry
member.summary: Defines the path that child elements are laid out along. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks:
You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .
The itself defines a two-dimentional curve, but in a composition with the property it defines three-dimentional curve.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.HorizontalPathAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets a horizontal alignment of the . This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.VerticalPathAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets a vertical alignment of the . This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.HorizontalItemAnchorOnPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal placement of the child controls relative to the carousel's path. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.VerticalItemAnchorOnPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical placement of the child controls relative to the carousel's path. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.PerspectiveAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle, in degrees, to which the planar curve is turned around the x-axis and thus forms a three-dimensional curve. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.PerspectiveFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value defining how much more distant elements are zoomed out comparing to less distant elements. This is an attached dependency property.
member.remarks: You can specify this property value on ItemsControl that hosts the .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Carousel.C1CarouselPanel.ActualScrollTransitionFactor
member.summary: Negative or positive depending on scroll direction. Absolute range is [0; 1].

member.summary: Main parser routine, which loops over each char in received string, and performs actions according to command/parameter being passed
member.param: String with path data definition
